item.title: Yes, There Is A Clear Path To Victory For The Pro-Life Movement This Year
item.description: This year, pro-life organizations across the country are poised to fight abortion by defunding Planned Parenthood and more.

item.title: Why It’s Absolutely Christian To Swiftly Deport All Illegal Migrants
item.description: To be un-Christian, deportation would have to be unjust, unmerciful, or both — and none of those are the case.

item.title: Michigan’s Next Elections Could Determine The Direction Of National Politics
item.description: Political control of the vital swing state is almost entirely up for grabs in 2026.
